name: Digital History
description: Explores implications for history and its methods of the shift from print to digital sources. Imparts introductory skills in the manipulation digital media, such as the use of maps, GIS and big data.
prerequisites: 200-level History course or one of WDW235H1/WDW236H1
exclusions: HIS389H1 (Topics in History: Digital History), offered in Summer 2015, Winter 2016, and Winter 2017
